item.title: Star Trek: Nemesis Had A Moment Even More Disturbing Than Spock's Mind Meld In Star Trek VI
item.description: Spock's mind meld in Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country stands out as a disturbing scene, but Star Trek: Nemesis had a moment that was even worse.

item.title: Why Star Warsâ€™ Mandalorian & Grogu Movie Needs To Feel Like Season 1 All Over Again
item.description: The Mandalorian & Grogu movie is so much more than just Star Wars' return to the movie theater, and because of that, it needs to feel like season 1.

item.title: Christopher Reeve's 10 Best Movies, Ranked
item.description: From Above Suspicion to Deathtrap, the iconic actor of Superman has played so many more roles in his career, spanning many genres.
